search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Corsizio (corsizio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:
Optimized & Effective Pricing
-----------------------------

Corsizio enables you to securely manage all registrations, payments, attendees, feedback, and much more for all of your physical and virtual events, classes, courses, and workshops.

Pay-per-use Pricing Model
-------------------------

No monthly subscriptions or plans to choose from. Every account gets all available features.

Initial Free Usage
------------------

All core features

**Low volume** up to 50 new registrations per month

Every new account starts here

Start with free low-volume usage, then enable billing when your volume grows.

Enabled Usage Billing
---------------------

[How usage billing works](https://help.corsizio.com/billing)

All core features

**Unlimited** registrations

**No charge** for low-volume usage

We exempt your bill when your total usage is under 50 new registrations for the month.

Accept Online Payments
----------------------

[View fees & currencies](https://help.corsizio.com/fees)

Fees are deducted directly from the amount by payment processor

We do not bill you for this and no payment card is needed

When you accept online payments, we will facilitate the payment processing via [Stripe](https://stripe.com/) to your bank account, and the nominal service fee is deducted during each online payment transaction automatically. You will not be billed for these fees separately.

[![Image 1: Stripe Verified Partner](https://www.corsizio.com/images/stripe-verified-partner-white-button.svg)](https://stripe.partners/directory/corsizio)

Summary of Key Features
-----------------------

Some of the key features we know you'll love about Corsizio.

*   Simple and beautiful registration forms with custom fields as a single-step flow.
    
*   Online card payments are directly deposited into your bank account using Stripe.
    
*   Easily enable waiting list, collect feedback, and grant completion certificates.
    
*   Full security with 256-bit SSL encryption on all pages, data, and payment processing.
    
*   Optimized for all modern devices — desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
    
*   Set early-bird pricing, offer discounts, issue refunds, and collect taxes.
    
*   Auto-generated events public portal and registration pages with a co-branded web address.
    
*   Attendees can use your events public portal page to lookup listings by many filters.
    
*   Embed event cards and other registration widgets on any existing website.
    
*   Single or multi-user access along with managing multiple instructors.
    
*   Notifications are sent to attendees and instructors to keep them informed.
    
*   Manage attendees, track with activity notes, and export registration data.
    
*   Brand each listing with a custom cover photo and an overlay video.
    
*   Reports and stats related to registrations, attendees, and payments.
    
*   Integrate with Google Analytics, MailChimp, and Zapier for other apps and services.
    

### Corsizio efficiently powers the core of your teaching, training, and other event-based business.

Quick Answers
-------------

Here are a few things you may want to know.  
[Read all FAQs](https://www.corsizio.com/faq) or visit our [Help Site](https://help.corsizio.com/ "Corsizio help, support, documentation, and contact").

[### Can I pass on the registration or online payment fees to my attendees?](https://www.corsizio.com/pricing#Q09)Yes, there are two main ways that you can pass any of the registration or payment fees to your attendees. The most obvious way is to increase the cost of your event price by your expected fee expense. You can see how to calculate your fees in our help article [How to save on online payment service fees](https://help.corsizio.com/article/60-how-to-save-on-online-payment-service-fees). Many attendees get put off by the idea of having to pay event registration fees and this allows you to bundle the cost as part of the event and minimize the risk of losing a registration. If you are okay with having your attendees see the fees separately, you can use the event price add-on feature and make it a mandatory part of their registration.

[### What if my events are free, for charity, or not-for-profit?](https://www.corsizio.com/pricing#Q07)You are welcome to use Corsizio for any such event needs and will not incur any charges for your registrations if you have low-volume usage, as per [our pricing](https://www.corsizio.com/pricing). We aim to provide everyone equally with an ultra-low, highly discounted, pay-per-use, and cost-effective model for higher volume needs, while offering full access to all of our features, support, security, data storage, and service value. Therefore, cost is dependent on volume of usage and not on the event price or purpose.

[![Image 2: Capterra Best Ease of Use for Class Registration 2023](https://brand-assets.capterra.com/badge/f67318b8-b3d3-425b-bed3-085d8bc9b745.png)](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/ "Best Ease of Use Badge")

[![Image 3: Capterra Best Value for Event Booking 2023](https://brand-assets.capterra.com/badge/b7a17a5d-ee5e-4696-904a-b5c7e5e2d9c2.png)](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/ "Best Value Badge")

[![Image 4: GetApp Category Leaders for Registration 2024](https://brand-assets.getapp.com/badge/591e788b-299e-43ca-90f2-acba7f3f47c4.png)](https://www.getapp.com/website-ecommerce-software/registration/category-leaders/ "Category Leaders Badge")

[![Image 5: Software Advice Most Recommended for Registration 2024](https://brand-assets.softwareadvice.com/badge/5472c4ea-efcb-4855-839b-84aed4160919.png)](https://www.softwareadvice.com/event-booking/corsizio-profile/ "Most Recommended Badge")

[![Image 6: Software Advice Front Runners for Registration 2024](https://brand-assets.softwareadvice.com/badge/fc9623a6-bac7-4c4f-b129-20003e40881e.png)](https://www.softwareadvice.com/registration/#frontrunners "Front Runners Badge")

We LOVE Corsizio! It is the BEST training registration platform there is for our faculty training needs at the University of Colorado Denver.

Amy A. — Academic Professional [Capterra review](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/reviews/262394/)

Corsizio has allowed us to become a consistently unique and influential entity in our area, and we truly thank you.

Aaron E. — Illustrator / Sculptor Direct feedback

Unbelievably high-quality registration system perfectly suited for higher ed events.

Mike D. — Assistant Director [Capterra review](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/reviews/520653/)

Best pay-as-you-go registration software I have come across.

Chakra W. — Proprietor [Capterra review](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/reviews/191263/)

Great service with excellent support. Simple, affordable, customizable, best customer service.

Ilian I. — Health & Fitness Manager [Capterra review](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/reviews/159798/)

Excellent. I could not be more happy than I am with the quality of service and features of Corsizio.

J.S. — Therapist / Educator [Capterra review](https://www.capterra.com/p/148885/Corsizio/reviews/408646/)

Gartner Digital Markets reviews are shared across its different brand sites and constitute the subjective opinions of individual end-users based on their own experiences and do not represent the views of Gartner or its affiliates.

Have a question? [Read the FAQs](https://www.corsizio.com/faq) or visit our

[Help Site](https://help.corsizio.com/ "Corsizio help, support, documentation, and contact").

Online registrations and payments for physical and virtual events, classes, courses, and workshops.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Corsizio operates on a pay-per-use model with no subscription fees. Initial usage up to 50 registrations per month is free.

additional_fees.fee_description: Fees are deducted directly by the payment processor (Stripe) during each transaction.
